articles.title: RJ Davis Floats His Way Into Career Best Scoring Night For UNC - 247Sports
articles.description: The senior scored a career-best 36 points for UNC against Wake Forest on Monday.
articles.content:
CHAPEL HILL, N.C. — At the top of their lungs, the fans inside the Dean E. Smith Center on Monday night chanted “RJ Davis” with 44.6 seconds left on the clock.
